entry.string: This Tag will not be allowed at all with this setting.
entry.translation: Thees Teg veell nut be-a ellooed et ell veet thees setteeng.

entry.string: This Tag will be allowed, but without added attributes. IE li is allowed, but li style=something will not be allowed.
entry.translation: Thees Teg veell be-a ellooed, boot veethuoot edded ettreebootes. IE lee is ellooed, boot lee style-a=sumetheeng veell nut be-a ellooed. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: This Tag will be allowed with any parameter.
entry.translation: Thees Teg veell be-a ellooed veet uny peremeter. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!
